page.title: 09Age of Houses in Knebworth
page.content: We surveyed the houses of the children of Knebworth school and received 157 replies. We asked the question "How old is your house?" The replies were: Up to one year {1} Between 1 and 10 years { 37 Between 10 and 50 years {27 Between 50 and 100 years {83} Over 100 years { 6} ___ Total { 154 We found by far that the most lived in houses were built between 50-100 years ago. However nearly as many lived in houses built in the last 50 years. Few people live in houses built over 100 years ago because Knebworth has rapidly developed this century. This is probably because of the Railway Station being built and more recently because of the A1(M) motorway, both giving access to London.
